ComicInfo.Title: Head Trip, Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s the Merc with two mouths! It’s the Dawn of the Living Deadpool! It’s…oh, you get the point. Crash-landing in the Savage Land, Deadpool finds himself face-to-face with the last thing on Earth he ever expected to see: his own Zombiefied head! To make matters worse, the nasty little critter went ahead and bit a few of the locals, so Deadpool has to put the smackdown on some zombie cavemen if he’s going to have any chance at escaping and completing his mission. Did we mention that a crack team of Hydra mercenaries are waiting in the wings?
Notes:
The regular cover is a homage and a parody of the movie poster for Jaws.The Marvel 70th Anniversary Variant cover is a homage and a parody of the Marvel 25th Anniversary Frame Covers.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 21:45:17. [CVDB166138]
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Joe Quesada, Sebastian Girner
ComicInfo.Characters: Angel, Captain America, Deadpool, Dr. Betty, Ghost Rider (Blaze), Grog, Hank Pym, Hulk, Iron Man, Ka-Zar, Luke Cage, Spider-Man, Thor, Wolverine, Zabu, Zombie Deadpool
